project.name: WLJ Executable Work Orchestration System
project.description: Implement a fully governed, AI-executable task system where phases control order, priorities control focus, and all work is deterministic and auditable.

tasks.name: Update CLAUDE.md with Executable Task Standard

description.objective: Define a permanent system-level standard that specifies what information every WLJ task must contain to be executable by AI.
inputs: CLAUDE.md file in the project root
actions: Add a section titled 'WLJ EXECUTABLE TASK STANDARD (MANDATORY)'.
Document that every task must include objective, inputs, actions, and output.
Document that Claude must refuse execution if any field is missing.
description.output: CLAUDE.md contains a clearly documented Executable Task Standard.

description.objective: Ensure Claude executes tasks deterministically and never guesses or infers missing information.
inputs: CLAUDE.md file in the project root
actions: Add a section describing Run Task mode.
Specify that CLAUDE.md must always be loaded first.
Specify that task validation occurs before execution.
Specify that actions are executed exactly as written and in order.
Specify that completion requires producing the defined output.
description.output: CLAUDE.md includes a clear Run Task execution contract.

tasks.name: Enforce executable task validation in Django model

description.objective: Prevent tasks without executable instructions from being persisted.
actions: Add validation requiring objective, inputs, actions, and output.
Ensure actions is a non-empty list.
description.output: The Task model rejects non-executable tasks.

tasks.name: Enforce executable task validation at API level

description.objective: Ensure executable task requirements apply to all API entry points.
actions: Ensure validation runs on create and update.
description.output: API layer enforces executable task structure.

tasks.name: Update task intake form to use structured executable fields

description.objective: Make it easy for users to create valid executable tasks.
actions: Add structured fields for objective and actions.
Prevent form submission if required fields are missing.
description.output: Task intake form reliably produces executable tasks.

description.objective: Allow full projects with executable tasks to be loaded from JSON.
actions: Fail load if any task is invalid.
description.output: Projects with executable tasks can be loaded safely from JSON.

description.objective: Allow Claude to execute tasks deterministically using Run Task mode.
actions: Pass task description verbatim to Claude.
description.output: Tasks can be executed end-to-end using Run Task mode.

description.objective: Allow Claude to recommend what to work on next using phase and priority rules.
actions: Determine active phase within the project.
Return clear recommendation and next action.
description.output: Claude can reliably recommend the next task to execute.

tasks.name: Add admin validation and safety checks

description.objective: Ensure no path exists to bypass executable task requirements.
description.output: Executable task requirements are enforced system-wide.
